A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What was the purpose of this movie. How has the story line from the Last Jedi moved anything along. Most of the humour seemed forced and there was no character developement. What a shame... I’ll give you a pass on this one but maybe someone could spend some money on a script and story line for the next one... or I will wait until I can rent it at home for any future Star Wars movies. Dissapointed is the nicest thing I could say...
